page.title: 11PITSFORD POST OFFICE
page.content: BECAUSE THERE ARE SEVERAL OLDER PEOPLE IN PITSFORD, THE POST OFFICE IS VERY BUSY. OLDER PEOPLE PREFER TO USE A CONVENIENT SUB POST OFFICE RATHER THAN TRAVEL TO A LARGER BRANCH. THEY USUALLY COME TO CLAIM THEIR STATE PENSION AND BUY QUITE A FEW THINGS WHILST THEY ARE IN THE SHOP. IN ADDITION TO PAYING OUT VARIOUS ALLOWANCES, WE SELL TELEPHONE STAMPS SO THAT CUSTOMERS MAY SPREAD THE COST OF USING THE TELEPHONE OVER AN EXTENDED PERIOD OF TIME. POSTAGE STAMP SALES AND CERTAIN FORMS OF SAVING SCHEMES ALSO REPRESENT A SIGNIFICANT PART OF POST OFFICE WORK. THE GENERAL POST OFFICE PAYS ME A MONTHLY SALARY BASED ON THE AMOUNT OF BUSINESS NORMALLY HANDLED. EMPLOYEES IN A MAIN POST OFFICE RECEIVE A SET SALARY INDEPENDENT OF THE NUMBER OF TRANSACTIONS.
